text.autoconfig.schmucks.title: Schmucks
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.chaosMod: All Schmucks will be incredibly short tempered - attacking teammates when provoked.
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.shortTem: The chance for a Schmuck to be short tempered, [0-1]
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.leatherH: The chance for a Schmuck to have a leather helmet equipped, [0-1]
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.jobRange: How far away a Schmuck can look for a job; reduce if you get frequent lag spikes or low TPS.
This can and will destroy any server/your computer at >16. Be aware.
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.jobInter: How often a Schmuck looks for their job block. Does not apply to miners.
Minimum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for a job.
Maximum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for a job.
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.miningIn: How often a Schmuck looks for an ore to mine.
Minimum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for an ore.
Maximum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for an ore.
